persistFocus.description: Whether hovering outside should clear the highlighted state

closeOnSelect.description: Whether the select should close after an item is selected

composite.description: Whether the select is a composed with other composite widgets like tabs or combobox

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the select when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the select when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the select.

deselectable.description:
Whether the value can be cleared by clicking the selected item.

**Note:** this is only applicable for single selection

form.description: The associate form of the underlying select.

highlightedValue.description: The key of the highlighted item

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  content: string
  control: string
  trigger: string
  clearTrigger: string
  label: string
  hiddenSelect: string
  positioner: string
  item(id: string | number): string
  itemGroup(id: string | number): string
  itemGroupLabel(id: string | number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the select. Useful for composition.

immediate.description: Whether to synchronize the present change immediately or defer it to the next frame

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation through the options

name.description: The `name` attribute of the underlying select.

onExitComplete.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

onHighlightChange.description: The callback fired when the highlighted item changes.

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

onOpenChange.description: Function called when the popup is opened

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

onValueChange.description: The callback fired when the selected item changes.

open.description: Whether the select menu is open

positioning.description: The positioning options of the menu.

present.description: Whether the node is present (controlled by the user)

scrollToIndexFn.description: Function to scroll to a specific index

value.description: The keys of the selected items

placeholder.description: Text to display when no value is selected.
